p.s: The article Globalised Environmental Pollution - Causes and Effects by Ankita Mitra, published on Blog on Environment focuses on environmental pollution and its effects.
In the authorsauthor's opinion climate change results from the growing wealth and industrialization.
The growing number of cars, hazardous fertilizers and other things used to make our lifeslives faster and more comfortable, influence the environment in a dangerous way.
This can be seen in changes in our climate like the growing number of bad weather like flood disasters or drought.
He appeals to the reader to change something, because we just have this planet and we can't pollute the air and our water any longer.
